title: For some reason hashinshin has 3k viewers today.
body:
So i tuned in and i thought to myself maybe hes not being annoying and complaining about everything that isnt jax for once!

First thing he says ''fiora needs to be hotfixed nerfed so broken'' while playing jax and losing lane to one super hard.

ROFL, how can ppl stand to watch this guy and his overly biased ranting every 20 seconds, and yeah it gets even worse if he dies or loses to a ranged champ/adc.
